name: PixelFem #45 - Jeanne Devereux
description:
Jeanne Deveraux was the first licensed female hair stylist in New York City. Is this work she is captured shaving her very first customer in 1927. While in Europe women had been common in barber shops and beauty parlors, in the United States it wasn’t until the 1920’s when women began to show up in the predominantly male run business.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
